snippet: Margaret Roach publishes her second memoir about rural life and gardening.
abstract: Margaret Roach book The Backyard Parables: Lessons on Gardening, and Life offers tales and advice about gardening and nature from her experience living in old upstate New York house.
lead_paragraph: Margaret Roach publishes her second memoir about rural life and gardening.

headline.seo: Margaret Roach’s Second Memoir About Rural Life and Gardening
headline.main: Tips From a Backyard on a Dirt Road
headline.print_headline: Tips From a Backyard on a Dirt Road
